name: @codeforlife/workspace
description: Shared dev dependencies and configs amongst the workspace.
//: These are the development dependencies shared across all submodules in
the workspace. NOTE: These are intentionally not placed under the
"devDependencies" key as then they would not be seen as required
packages by package managers when installing. Rather, this package itself
will be listed in the "devDependencies" of each submodule as a symlink,
